{{Description|The [[Masters of the Night-Wind]] have upheld an ancient custom for generations — using colorful woven scrolls to record the history of [[Natlan]]. It is precisely because of this tradition that you, who have come to the tribe quite by chance, have been entrusted with a mission.<br>To fulfill this mission, you realize that you must unravel a mystery that has gone unanswered for over two hundred years. '''Memories Flowing With Color''' is an [[Event]] in [[Version 5.3]].

==Event Details==
===Duration===
* After the Version 5.3 update – 2025/01/21 17:59

===Requirements===
* Act III
** [[Adventure Rank]] 28 or above
** Complete [[Archon Quest]] [[Chapter V]]: Act V "[[Incandescent Ode of Resurrection]]"
** In the current version, once you reach Adventure Rank 28 and complete [[Archon Quest]] Chapter I: Act III "[[A New Star Approaches]]," you can use the "[[Quick Start]]" function to unlock Archon Quest Chapter V: Act I "[[Flowers Resplendent on the Sun-Scorched Sojourn]]" and continue progressing up to the latest Archon Quest introduced in the current version update.

===Summary===
* Travelers who reach the required Adventure Rank and complete the prerequisite quests will be able to unlock Act III of "Tribal Chronicles: Masters of the Night-Wind."
* Complete the [[Tribal Chronicles]] within the specified duration to obtain additional [[Primogem]]s, [[Character Ascension Material]]s, [[Character Level-Up Material]]s, [[Natlan Local Specialty|Natlan regional specialties]], and other rewards.
